children.name: Meeting topics
GitHub access
Danny needs access to dev repo

Main repo branch is protected
Temp solution: everyone forks repo
Learn proper GitHub workflow
D3 visualization
Danny built D3 map visualization
Needs to add visualization to outcomes page
Import visualization component
Provide dummy data for now
Learn to pass real data to visualization later
Svelte
Danny learning Svelte
Struggling to understand some concepts
Pablo provides overview of file structure
Shows how to add new component to page
Directs Danny to Svelte D3 tutorial
Environment setup
Danny needs .env file with API keys
.env file added to Airtable for Danny
Reminder not to push .env to GitHub
Danny should clone, install dependencies, then npm run dev
Project priorities
Focus on implementing email functionality
D3 visualization deprioritized for now
Learn GitHub collaboration workflow
Danny and Pivulous should avoid pushing to repo for now
Chat dynamics
Danny's technical questions
Struggling to follow parts of conversation
Asks for Pablo to slow down and explain

Pablo provides guidance
Offers an overview of file structure
Shows how to import and use components
Suggests learning Svelte D3 tutorial

Conversational pace
